skills: Computers and Electronics, Administration and Management, Negotiation, Persuasion, Sales and Marketing
summary: Accomplished and energetic with a solid history of achievement in sales. Motivated leader with strong organizational and prioritization abilities. Areas of expertise include Meeting Goals, Negotiation and Selling to Customer Needs.
work_experience: This professional has held positions from March 2005 to the present. As a Sales Manager (January 2010 - Current), key responsibilities include resolving customer complaints, coordinating sales activities for various products, managing staffing, setting price schedules, and overseeing sales accounting and shipping operations. Earlier, as an Emergency Road Service Technician (July 2007 - March 2010), they performed tire and wheel services, vehicle maintenance, and responded to emergency calls at industrial sites. Their career began as a Wholesale Food Supplier (March 2005 - September 2007), where they managed sales, maintained records, drove delivery vehicles, prepared and priced meat products, handled customer orders and complaints, and managed purchasing and inventory.
